name: Smiley Dungeon
description:
Smiley Dungeon

A very simple Zelda 1-like dungeon with fighting smileys ! Find keys to open locks and progress, while beating evil angry smileys !

Controls for Keyboard

Up/Down/Right/Left Arrow : Move

Space : Attack 

This project was originally made to discover Godot and how it works. The game is very short and simple, but I still met a lot of problem while making it since it was my first time with the engine. Big thanks to fornclake for his tutorial series !
